modName: Ultimate Best Sword in the World
summary: Specialises in palm styles of martial arts and wields the Ultimate Best Sword in the World
descriptionHtml:
[center]Update V2.0
This is only for retexture, if you like old version can no change it.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92594/92594-1531927266-1765793972.jpeg[/img]﻿

Bù Jīngyún is one of the two protagonists. 

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92594/92594-1531904309-2107973152.jpeg[/img]﻿
He was born in the Bou Family Village in Hangzhou. His father died when he was young, so his mother remarried Fok Bou-tin and he became Fok's stepson and was renamed 'Fok Ging-gok' . He specialises in palm styles of martial arts and wields the 'Ultimate Best Sword in the World' 

[b][size=6]Create Credit[/size][/b][/center][center]cthkclnpc1 & Princess Hyin(嫣格格)
[/center][center][size=6][b]At the End
[/b][/size]My other follower's mod link

Tianshan Tongluo
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92148/92148-1529944672-224572944.jpeg[/img]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92148]Tianshan Tongluo
[/url]﻿[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/91150/91150-1525497336-1002591347.png[/img]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90993]Highland Park[/url]﻿[/center]
